Posts.Content: Thank you so much for asking . It means a lot x So I went to the hospital today and saw the specialist. She was very sweet but very vague... Couldn't get much out of her. She told me to come back tomorrow for a ultra sound and a core biopsy :/ After asking her what she thinks it was she said its more likely fibroadenoma but need further testing to make sure. I asked her if the fibroadenoma causes the "dryness " look on my skin and she said that's something we will discuss after my results ! Trying to be positive here At least o know I will have results by next week x And how about you? Have u made an appointment yet ? Hope you are ok. Pls try not to stress too much . I'm here hoping its a clear for both of us big hugs xx
Posts.Title: large lump and urgent referral... only 29?!

Posts.Content: Hello emmababe, Hope you are doing well and not too stressed . Little update... I had my ultrasound and discovered that what I have is cysts and not lumps . They were very hard and easy to confuse with a hard mass . The radiologist said I didn't need to have a core biopsy ( yaaayyyy) What I had instead was fine needle aspiration ( to remove some of the liquid ) I think he removed some cells from some skin mass as I saw him scraping some samples into mini clear plates . He sent them off to a lab and I will meet my doctor next Thursday to discuss results x He said he's extremely confident I have nothing to worry about . So I am definitely more relieved x Maybe cysts cause skin to appear irregular and nipple sensitivity ... So please don't worry . Keep your hopes up! It could just be a large cyst . He said its extremely common and they can get very large . I had 2 lumps . They were quite hard and large . And they only hurt when I put pressure on them . He removed some fluid . I can still feel they are there but smaller now after the needle aspiration. Not sure if he left some fluid or maybe is scar tissue . Will ask my doctor in Thursday . I am hoping you get your app ASAP. It's funny you mention they might push you back because of your age ... My radiologist asked my age when I was laying in the ultrasound bed . When I said 29 , he said it was crucial info... He said that in the UK and States if u are 28 or younger and they discover cysts or fibro they won't do a needle aspiration or biopsy . Nothing would be sent to labs because of the age . I'll let you know my results . Keep me updated on how you are doing x Thinking of you Big hugs !! X
Posts.Title: large lump and urgent referral... only 29?!

Posts.Content: Hi Emmababe. I am 29 as well and just found a lump while showering too. Been referred to a specialist . Sorry I can't help you more as I am waiting as well... I hope everything goes well on your exams . When are you booked for? Sending you big hugs xx
Posts.Title: large lump and urgent referral... only 29?!

Posts.Content: Hi emmababe, I am in london. I have been Booked for tomorrow evening ... So it has been fairly quick. Very nervous as don't like hospitals or needles ( hopefully wont need a biopsy ) ... x Hope you hear soon from your referral . Waiting is always hard . Will come back to the forum to update results . Big hugs and take care xx
